de.iabg.swing.event
Class LoggerLogListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.swing.event.LoggerLogListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogListener, java.util.EventListener
public class LoggerLogListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogListener

This implementation of a LogListener links a Logger with a Loggable object. The Logger typically creates an instance of this class and registers the instance onto one or more Loggable objects. The Loggable objects fire log strings to this listener, which notifies the Logger to update the log.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
